title: Mediterranean Specialty Foods Importer | FOODMatch + DIVINA
text: FOODMatch + DIVINA is a producer and importer of Mediterranean specialty foods. We are your one-stop source for responsibly and traditionally crafted olives, antipasti, spreads, sauces, condiments and ingredients. Through the hands of our growers, we create great tasting, sustainably produced, authentic foods that nurture community and enhance your quality of life. Read our founder's storyExplore Our Products Product Catalog Like walking through a bustling outdoor market in the Mediterranean, we invite you to discover our award winning and responsibly crafted olives, antipasti and ingredients. Browse Our ProductsLatest News Divina Partners with Philadelphia Cream Cheese to Launch Philly-tini Olives See All NewsSign up for Our Newsletter Interested in hearing the latest about our harvest, specialty food news, recipes and new items?
